comments.body: Go newbie question again here: What is the purpose of this this file (plugins.go), which imports a package but does nothing else?

On the import of the package, the init function is called [here](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/2825/files#diff-eefd551b184909a2545b2ba3870e1f3fR26) which has the effect of registering the predicates. This is similar to the pattern of registering the cloudproviders and credentialproviders e.g. https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/blob/master/cmd/kubelet/plugins.go.
